evals.prompt: Use steel browser to open https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login, sign in with username tomsmith and password SuperSecretPassword!, wait until the success flash appears, return the final URL, then cleanly stop the session.
evals.expected_output: Uses a named steel browser session with start/open/fill/click/wait/get url/stop sequence and confirms the secure-area URL.

evals.prompt: I have this legacy script: `agent-browser open https://example.com && agent-browser snapshot -i && agent-browser click @e3 && agent-browser get text @e7`. Convert it to steel browser commands and include any lifecycle commands you think are needed for reliability.
evals.expected_output: Converts prefixes to steel browser and adds sensible lifecycle/session discipline without changing intended behavior.

evals.prompt: My automation keeps failing with `No active live session found` and occasionally opens a fresh browser tab each command. Give me a minimal steel browser diagnostic and recovery command sequence.
evals.expected_output: Diagnoses session continuity/mode mismatch and provides actionable commands using sessions/live/start/stop with consistent --session usage.
